section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, any renewal, extension, or refund made under § 12-632 of this subtitle shall be by a written agreement signed by each party.
If an extension is granted without any additional charge, the agreement need be signed only by the sales finance company.
At the time a renewal, extension, or refund is made, the sales finance company shall deliver to the buyer an exact copy of the agreement.
